text: Francisco Rodríguez García (8 March 1934 – 17 May 2022), nicknamed Rodri, was a Spanish footballer. He played as a defender. He was born in Barcelona, Spain. He made four appearances for the Spain national football team in 1962. Rodri died on 17 May 2022 in Barcelona at the age of 88.Legendary defender from the 1960s 'Rodri' passes away ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Footballers from Barcelona
title: Rodri (footballer, born 1934)
